original_title: Sir Georg Solti The Maestro Vol. 1
overview: A collector's celebration of Solti's time in Chicago and includes bonus material of Solti rehearsing the Vienna Philharmonic. Included are works by Rossini, Mendelssohn, Bruckner, Wagner, Strauss, Kodaly, Bartok, Weiner, Berlioz.
title: Sir Georg Solti The Maestro Vol. 1
